Title: Vanquishers
Legend: Vanquishers are expert swordsmen, warrior-knights for whom the skillful kill is everything. They excel at cleaving through armoured foes and milling hordes both, wielding their celestial greatswords to hack down any enemy that dares approach.
Intro: Each model in a Vanquishers unit is armed with a Celestial Greatsword.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Thunderhead Brotherhood • Vanguard Wing

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Vanquisher-Prime. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Celestial Greatsword.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Storm-forged Icon Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of a unit that includes any Storm-forged Icon Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Vanquisher Herald. If this unit receives the Rally command while it includes any Vanquisher Heralds, when you roll a dice for a slain model from this unit, you can return 1 slain model to this unit on a 5+ instead of only a 6.

Rules.Name: Lightning Strikes
Rules.Fluff: Vanquishers have mastered all manner of deadly combat techniques and deal out death with a pitiless efficiency.
Rules.Rule: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of a Celestial Greatsword if there are 5 or more models in the target unit. Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of a Celestial Greatsword instead of 1 if there are 10 or more models in the target unit.
